thread.title: PDP sank when Ahmadu Ali and I left – Obasanjo
thread.title_full: PDP sank when Ahmadu Ali and I left – Obasanjo

author: Abdulfatai Ayobami Ibrahim
title: PDP sank when Ahmadu Ali and I left – Obasanjo
text:
The whirlwind of change has begun and who else is next? Human power is temporal. Be just 
Why panic, is aso rock his personal office Yawe1 
I wonder ooo, even is nobody personal office YK 
Because he was born there and his fathers house. Yeye set of people. Femi Pedro 
Fire on the mountain, fire on the rooftop Good Nigerian 
Whats the big deal ? wise 
why the fuss about his sack, if the presidency so wish to sack anyone its his perogative to do such afterall ASO rock is no personal office wise 
anyone occupying public office is subject to change greatbiodun 
What is the big about the sacking? Orji Kalu 
His is one of Mr Presidents nightmare. The man deliberately book genuine people and info to Nigerian president in the name of keeping his job. Not minding the office of president. However, PDP is dead in Edo State where Mr Mike come also PDP BOT Chairman and Minister of Work. What are they doing for Mr President to help him win election. If you can not deliver your state, you don’t have business arrogating powers to other people. Musa Aliyu 
@orji kalu are u orji uzor kalu MamaTTa 
@Musa Na fake kalu be that Kalitaaruku 
Haba, dats unfair. So be because Orji uzor Kalu is prominent any other person bearing similar name is fake?? Thats unfair and a miopic view….perhaps u were just joking anyway todal77 
So you think millionaires have time to come here and insult Igbo people like akars? Ha ha ha ha. oz 
U are not correct,are u 4rm Edo state?do u think Edo people are hapi with d leadership style of osho baba?do u know d numbers of teachers that had been relief from their work?d u know the threat in EDHA over relieving of workers 4rm work 2?guy,APC will find it difficult in dis state.PDP is not dead here,more will defect to PDP kakaki 
Na him Papa Office be that ?? Na so ebi 
Chai ! Chai! Chai! Wahala dey o! this is going to affect a certain woman I know very well chai chai chai Nigerian Youth 
Can Nigerian unemployed youths, apply for d job? Punch if the answer is NO, why given us this news? Obomni, 
GEJ wants to put an Ijaw or Rivers man there. Jehovah Ova Do 
Sometimes I wonder how we view, react and respond to decision from the office of the president. If he was a northern that is removed, its becos GEJ is angry with APC. The office of the SA to the president is not an inheritance. Decipher Taster 
He has taken a lot to take care of himself. 
For serving goodluck to the best of your ability – GOOD LUCK TO YOU. jon 
Good idea abandon the sinking ship before is too late next will be abati mark my word great change will come to us we have suffered enough gej you are going down abiodun johnson 
Reuben Abati better relocate to Bayelsa, he’s no longer wanted in Abeokuta. Femi Pedro 
Another hastily concerted lie that will soon unravel YK 
These are one of the few people misleading Mr.President. I think it is dawning on him now but it is rather late. ogunbitan oyetunde 
According to a report by Sahara Reporters, President Jonathan has asked his Chief of Staff, Mike Oghiadome to resign. Oghiadohme, 55, was indicted by security operatives in the messy financial misappropriation scandal currently rocking the NNPC myname 
indicted…?that’s funny. what about d supervising minister of nnpc? what has chief of staff got 2do with nnpc’s finances? PDP 
the thief of staff should go home and spend his share of $49 billion they stole. his oga at the top has settled him, allow another thief of staff to eat too. thank u oz 
Mr president is a very nice man,e did not go by wht people told him,he took his time to relief dis fake ogiadome 4rm his work.Ogiadome is a betrayal,he sold PDP to d den ACN in is region Estako simply cos of their Estako agenda.He was reaping were e did not sow.I am happy e has been sent home.
